column2: "Our mission this time is a request Rela asked us to cooperate with."
" She wants us to find Kamitsu of Ro, the Elder Dragon Clan that she serves."
"It seems that normally on this planet, she should be able to feel her presence, but hasn't been able to recently."
"Being unable to locate her, and unable to communicate, things haven't been very calm lately."
"She's definitely somewhere in the Dragon Alter, but they're unsure exactly where."
"It seems that lately, there has also been some Darker activity."
"While it's unlikely that anything would happen, I want to help put Rela's mind at ease."
"But, a number of Darkers appearing at a time like this... I wonder if there's something they're after."
"I wonder if there's something inside the Dragon alter that they're after?"
"I don't want to cause any more problems for the Dragon clan. I don't want something like that to happen again."
"Sorry, that can wait until later. We should focus on finding Kamitsu of Ro first."
